about_the_game:
Fortunes Miles Away is your ultimate cars racing competition blending unique missions, extensive choice of cars and actions-packed adventures.

Fortune Miles Away is a one-of-its-kind game allowing each player to evolve into a dynamic environment with a realistic 3D engine providing you real-life sensations of driving exceptional cars, from coupe to concept cars.

Start your journey at the bottom of the society, complete jobs on the go as many as you can, make hard earned cash and increase your gears!

With an open environment, real-life like traffic and activities taking place across the city, you will immerse in the most engaging cars racing simulation.

You will be able to take place in over 50 different cars, providing yourself the unique chance to prove your driving skills but also your true negotiation skill along the way.

Wait no more, pick up your first car, accept the first mission and off you go! Remember, opportunities are everywhere and the more risky they are, the more rewarding they will be.



Open environment

A careful curated, designed to foster interactions, fun and promising a never dull moment, that's what awaits you in Fortune Miles Away.

A game like no other, where wide space, empty highways and small narrow lanes will challenge your driving skills while keeping your heart beat high.

From the small alleys of China Town to the Pacific Coast Highway, you will enjoy discovering the scenic landscapes during and after completing your missions.

Think about skipping a turn? Think twice, you may find yourself in a worst situation.
A real-life like traffic, dynamic weather, and pedestrian activities across the city are guaranteed to make your driving even more intense.



Cars collection and realistic cars controller

As any car game, these vehicles are the rocking bed of the whole game. As such, we have been carefully selecting and designing unique cars, associated with the most advanced car racing controller and engine available on the market to give to you, our dear drivers, the best driving experience.

Don’t be surprised to be challenged at first, as these fast and nervous cars will make you doubt yourself.



Missions packed adventure solo or with friends

Providing you with different missions across a diverse environment, you will enjoy driving across the city by accomplishing your various endeavors.

From escort style missions, to control a given district or collecting packages, you will definitely be astonished by the depth of the missions you will need to accomplish to be recognized as the best driver among your peers.

But that’s not all!

As a true competition oriented game, you just don't need to be good but the best to rank among the top drivers out there. Contrary to other cars racing games, you won't be able to buy your rank in the top ladders but instead you will need to out-rank your peers one race at a time.

Don't under-estimate your opponents, having the nicest looking car around isn't a guarantee you will make it. Developing your driving skills mission after mission will lead you to the top but be ready to endure a long way to reach this place.
detailed_description:
JOIN THE COMMUNITY

The proof of concept is ready.

Join the community to support the game development. Fortune Miles Away is a game designed with the support of its fan community, be part of it! The game release will be in January 2024.

What’s the community is participating in for the final version:

Shape the story: Participate to the story telling and shape the adventure you want to play;
Decide which missions will be implemented; Car wash war, VIP interception, Tron, Zombie mode?

Get the game you want to play, tell us to make it more arcade, or more simulation, more Role playing game with quest system and experience level focus on character development or more on fine tuning cars specifications and upgrades? Tell us !

Give feedbacks to enhance features!
